name: Carmen NACCARATO and Rosina Naccarato, his wife, Appellants, v. MELLON BANK, N.A., Administrator of the Estate of Miles D. Mrvos, Deceased

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, jj.
parties: Carmen NACCARATO and Rosina Naccarato, his wife, Appellants, v. MELLON BANK, N.A., Administrator of the Estate of Miles D. Mrvos, Deceased.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: E.J. Julian, Julian & Associates, Washington, for appellants.
Deborah D. Olszewski, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
604 A.2d 1020
Carmen NACCARATO and Rosina Naccarato, his wife, Appellants, v. MELLON BANK, N.A., Administrator of the Estate of Miles D. Mrvos, Deceased.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 11, 1992.
Decided April 16, 1992.
Reconsideration Denied Aug. 13, 1992.
E.J. Julian, Julian & Associates, Washington, for appellants.
Deborah D. Olszewski, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, jj.
